titleStmt.title: Die Martis, 23. Maii, 1648. An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, for putting malignants and Papists out of the cities of London, Westminster, late lines of communication, and twenty miles distant.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted at London for John Wright,
